pullrequest.title: Remove two members in Link that are never really used and are confusing

content.raw: I would vote for deprecating the functions on gazebo9 and only removing the functions and protected variables on gazebo10. The reasoning is that we give users one release cycle to adapt their code in case they're making use of the protected variables. But we've broken this kind of reasoning before...
content.html: I would vote for deprecating the functions on gazebo9 and only removing the functions and protected variables on gazebo10. The reasoning is that we give users one release cycle to adapt their code in case they're making use of the protected variables. But we've broken this kind of reasoning before...
